name: hootstrap
description: The CSS framework that powers ProctorU's front-end design.
author: Justin Licata <licata.justin@gmail.com>

scripts.jekyll: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build-docs: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build JEKYLL_ENV=production
scripts.deploy-docs: git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix docs/_site origin gh-pages
